# How to use media query

## create your app

```ts
import { useMediaQuery } from 'reev/react'
//                    or from '@reev/external/react'

export const App = () => {
        const matches = useMediaQuery('(min-width: 400px)')
        return <span>{matches ? 'ğŸ‘€' : 'âŒ'}</span>
}
```

import { useMediaQuery } from 'reev/react'
//                    or from '@reev/external/react'

export const App = () => {
        const matches = useMediaQuery('(min-width: 400px)')
        return <span>{matches}</span>
}

<App />
